issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
startActivity - createIntent to view a local file does not work. FileProvider API needs to be used
Tested using 6.1.0/6.2.2 GA targeting API 25

See https://medium.com/@ali.muzaffar/what-is-android-os-fileuriexposedexception-and-what-you-can-do-about-it-70b9eb17c6d0
fields.summary: createIntent using file:// leads to FileUriExposedException

comments.body: Hello, As of Android 7.0, Intents should use a ContentProvider to provide the DATA URI of created Intents. We have an issue waiting in production for a fix in 6.3.0 release. Thanks.
